blacklist_PatternExplainedText.message:
The following patterns are supported:

half-life 3
(The term must match exactly, case-insensitive.)

'Half-Life 3'
(The term must match exactly, case-sensitive.)

~half-life
(The term must be contained, case-insensitive.)

/^half\-?life [0-9]+/i
(The term must match the regular expression, case-insensitive.)

/^Half\-?Life [0-9]+/
(The term must match the regular expression, case-sensitive.)
